Certification Appeal.small description: Submit a form if you need to appeal any certification action.
Certification Appeal.description:
Any holders that believe that their certification has been wrongfully revoked or suspended may request for a certification appeal, explaining why their certification was revoked and why it should be reinstated. More information can be found at
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1nHklfaWjcKAhr3-MiYBV5stCsFbPT1p6ixZ34Va1Tu0/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.dr5amj48phe

Certification Account Transfer.small description: Submit a form if you need to transfer accounts.
Certification Account Transfer.description:
For any holders that need to transfer their certification to a different ROBLOX account. Under the evidence question, give proof which shows that you used to own the old account (e.g full screenshot of an email from ROBLOX mentioning your username).

Database Link: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1vsa5klFFKEmezEJGeNYrVF3aGmMvUqH-U9mvZ1-LmV4/edit

Blacklist Appeal.small description: Submit a form if you need to transfer accounts.
Blacklist Appeal.description:
For anybody that needs to appeal an academy or a staff blacklist. They should explain why their blacklist should be removed. Between 5-7 sentences are expected.

Blacklist Database: https://trello.com/b/A0JJb2YX/post-blacklist-database

Certification Username Update.small description: Submit a form if you have changed your username.
Certification Username Update.description:
Check the database to see if your username has updated. If not, submit this form. 
Database Link: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1vsa5klFFKEmezEJGeNYrVF3aGmMvUqH-U9mvZ1-LmV4/edit
